tdta: (if fail saving throw at start of their turn)

aoeb: Wall of ice when player moves through

aoed: Poison at start of player's turn from bite

aoec: Whirlwind flung into creature or wall

tm: Your choice of acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, radiant or thunder
r: Your choice of acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, radiant or thunder

t: glaive in small or medium form

aoe: swallow damage at start of turn
